entries.title: ChatGPT Has Been Sucked Into India's Culture Wars
entries.description: Hindu nationalists claim that the chatbot has insulted their deities, sparking an online uproar.

entries.title: Microsoft Taps ChatGPT to Boost Bing—and Beat Google
entries.description: The second-ranked search engine is getting a new chatbot interface that attempts to synthesize information from sites across the web.

entries.title: How to Watch Google’s AI Search Event Live
entries.description: The company’s presentation will focus on new artificial intelligence-powered features in Search. You can stream it for free on YouTube.

entries.title: The Mastodon Bump Is Now a Slump
entries.description: Active users have fallen by more than 1 million since the exodus from Elon Musk’s Twitter, suggesting the decentralized platform is not a direct replacement.
